description: You are in a sitting room. The hollow of a large fireplace dominates the West wall. A small, wooden table beside it appears sturdy, despite it's advanced age. Below it on the floor lies the skeleton of what appears to have been a human, dressed in clothes that have rotted away over time. There are doors to the North and South.
hidden: Beneath the skeleton you find an old, leather pouch and an iron dagger. The dagger is brittle with rust, and useless as a weapon. The pouch contains 5 gold pieces.
